Reference

LIANA

liana-wrapper and related functions

liana_aggregate()

Function to Aggregate CCC Method Results

liana_defaults()

Function to pass Default Arguments for each method

liana_wrap()

Run LIANA Wrapper

Method calling functions

call_cellchat()

CellChat x Omni Pipe function

call_connectome()

Function to call connectome with databases from OmniPath

call_italk()

Run iTALK with OmniPath data

call_natmi()

Call NATMI Pipeline from R with Resources Querried from OmniPath

call_sca()

Function to call SingleCellSignalR with databases from OmniPath

call_squidpy()

Call Squidpy Pipeline via reticulate with OmniPath and format results

Format Method Output

FormatConnectome()

Helper function to filter and format connectome

FormatNatmi()

Load NATMI results from folder and format appropriately

FormatSCA()

Helper function to format SingleCellSignalR results

FormatiTALK()

Helper Function to Filter and format iTalk results

Get_ or Select_ Functions

Functions used to obtain resources, lists, etc

get_ligands()

Retrieves ligands from one ligand receptor resource

get_lr_resources()

Helper function that returns the name of each intercell resource in OmniPath

get_partners()

Retrieves intercellular communication partners (ligands or receptors) from one ligand-receptor resource.

get_receptors()

Retrieves receptors from one ligand-receptor resource

get_resources()

Helper Function to return the Resources in LIANA

select_resource()

Helper Function to Handle resource choices
